about_the_game:
"Shine. Shine bright."

Never be less than your fabulous self. Leopard print, hot pink, Glam Gear is high-end chic for high-end hacker. You'll make them all melt.

Contains:
- Complete set of clothing items.
- Paint job for vehicles.
- Custom finish for weapons.
- Decals for RC devices.
